website_summaries.verdict: A low-profile bootie, bordering on a shootie. They're cute, and if you're willing to stick with it for a while, the toe box should widen.
pros: Toe stretches for comfort over time
Comes in a variety of colors
Suede leather upper with zipper closure
Man-made lining.Lightly padded insole with man-made sole
cons: May run small, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Glad I listened
customer_reviews.text: Definitely size up!!! Ordered half a size bigger due to reviews of it running small, Glad I listened. I’m a true 8, ordered 8.5 and it fits me well. Love the Ivy green color.
customer_reviews.author: HELEN D.

customer_reviews.title: so the height of these is perfect. I haven't had them through the winter yet
customer_reviews.text: I have issues with finding boots that fit my calves, so the height of these is perfect. I haven't had them through the winter yet, so I'm curious to see how they hold up, but I did spray them with Camp Dry, so I'm hoping that helps to keep them in nice shape! The color is Toffee is also really fun. I was crossing my fingers when I ordered because they went down to a great price and I was pleasantly surprised by how pretty the color it. It's nice and warm without being too "orangey"(is that a word??) and coordinates well with lots of colors.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot,
customer_reviews.text: Love and color (Ivy). Good fit in my regular size. When I first put the boots on they felt a little snug in the toe area but after wearing they stretched and are very comfortable. In fact, I might purchase in another color if available in my size.
customer_reviews.author: Denise K Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: The best boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much that I’ve bought 3 pairs and have used suede dye to dye them the colors I actually want ((they didn’t have my size in other colors)) btw the dying process was very easy, just make sure you brush it between coats and don’t put too much on at a time. I went up a half size, normally I’m an 8.5 but went to 9.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My 2nd pair of Lucky Brand booties ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 9 and I’m glad I went up a half-size; perfect fit and I love the style
customer_reviews.author: MARYPEARL PARNELL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to get 1/2 size larger than I usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Oh so cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Way more comfortable than expected - super cute. I have a very wide forefoot, and although this is a little snug as a M, I think a wide would've been too big. Great color. Beautiful suede.
customer_reviews.author: MamaTechGeekPrincessShopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cute! Love these booties. I usually wear a 7 in Lucky but the 7.5 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Golfdogs

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with how they fit
customer_reviews.text: After having kids, I am between an 8-8.5. In this shoe I read reviews and went with the 8.5. Very happy with how they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Y

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. Very comfortable and the color is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mary Landis

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots! Fit a little small but not uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots! Fit a little small but not uncomfortable. I think they will stretch to fit my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine, it came right on time. I order the toffee color and I love it! I’m usually 6.5 and ordered the 7 and fit perfect, so comfortable !! I’m definitely ordering in other colors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fabiola calvillo

customer_reviews.title: Half a size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe!! remember to get half a size larger and it will fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but comes narrow
customer_reviews.text: The tongue of the shoe is not wide enough that it cuts to your skin as you walk. With the material being suede, not soft, it can get very irritating. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ChelB

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It runs about 1/2 size smaller and it feels hard. Not confortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful fits fine a little small but just did not look right on me.
customer_reviews.author: Pat11

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY THESE
customer_reviews.text: Stiff at first, but top notch boots! ADORABLE!! Great with just about anything in your closet. The boots totally are the bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Locke

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful booties, but run small
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful booties, but run small, heel is pefect height, sadly I had to return them because the size...i ordered the 71/2...
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, perfect fit, and great color. I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: marta

customer_reviews.title: Run small & Dig into my ankles!
customer_reviews.text: They run very small! I’d order Half a size up! Also, they dig into the inside of my ankles! Sadly, they are going back to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

product_meta.title: Lucky Brand Women's Faithly Fashion Boot
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately ankle-high from arch
